data.text:
Canvas Tote Bag

Our tote bags are made from soft, durable, poly-poplin fabric and include a one inch (2.5cm) black strap for easy carrying on your shoulder. All seams are double-stitched for added durability. Each tote bag is machine-washable in cold water and is printed on both sides using the same image. Approximate size of bag is 50x33cm (20"x13")

Our tote bags are made from soft durable fabric and include a strap for easy carrying

These are individually made so all sizes are approximate

EDITORS COMMENTS

In this print from May 1988, we are transported back to a moment in time when two legendary actors, Rod Steiger and Claire Bloom, graced the entertainment industry with their undeniable talent. The image captures the essence of a power couple who not only shared their lives but also their passion for acting. Rod Steiger's commanding presence is evident as he stands tall beside his wife, exuding confidence and charisma. Known for his remarkable performances in films such as "On the Waterfront" and "In the Heat of the Night". Steiger was celebrated for his ability to bring complex characters to life on screen. Beside him stands Claire Bloom, an accomplished actress renowned for her versatility and grace. With her radiant smile and elegant poise, she complements Steiger perfectly. Having starred in classics like "The Haunting" and "Charly". Bloom left an indelible mark on both stage and screen throughout her illustrious career. This photograph not only showcases these talented individuals but also offers a glimpse into their personal lives. It reminds us that even amidst fame and success, they were just like any other loving couple â€“ united by their shared dreams and aspirations. As we gaze upon this nostalgic image captured by Sunday Mirror's lens, we are reminded of the profound impact these actors had on our collective memory. Their contributions to film will forever be cherished as they continue to inspire generations of performers yet to come.
